title: This Google Chrome tool could actually be used to steal login data
description: Chrome Application Mode can be used to trick people into giving away passwords, researchers warn.

title: Microsoft Edge update promises to fend off dangerous web-based attacks
description: Microsoft Edge 106 is getting boosted security and enhanced workflow.

title: Good luck getting hold of the latest Raspberry Pi any time soon
description: The founder of Raspberry Pi has confirmed shortages will continue for some time yet.

title: Office real estate prices could be facing an "apocalypse"
description: Office occupancy rates are still way below pre-pandemic levels - and may never be the same again.

title: Elon Musk's Twitter acquisition deal is reportedly back on
description: Elon Musk reportedly has decided to stop fighting and go forward with his $44B Twitter acquisition

title: Pixel Watch looks slim and sleek in recent unboxing leak
description: A leaker on Reddit unboxed a Google Pixel Watch showing the device in detail, but would not turn it on

title: Mastercard wants to help end crypto fraud
description: As governments dither on regulation, Mastercard is expanding its fraud detection to the crypto sphere.

title: This new deal could create massive design library for creatives
description: Graphic design library Freepik acquires Iconfinder and Original Mockups.

title: It looks like Fallout's spiritual successor is getting a PS5 remaster
description: First details of the PS5 and Xbox Series X|S version of space RPG The Outer Worlds emerge from Taiwan rating board.

title: Microsoft Teams updates are about to become less of a total pain
description: A new version of Microsoft Teams will make installing updates manually far more straightforward.

title: These are officially the worst malware strains of the year
description: Emotet reigns supreme, despite a number of damaging setbacks.

title: VLC Media Player claps back at India ban with court challenge
description: Despite VPNs allowing VLC's downloads, its block is accused to violate international obligations to protect free speech in India.

title: Scammers take to GitHub to hoodwink other cybercriminals
description: Latest Microsoft Exchange flaw scheme discovered on GitHub shows there really is no honor among thieves.

title: Remote services are becoming an attractive target for ransomware
description: Hackers apparently love breaching networks through flaws in remote services, even more than using stolen credentials.

title: PC gamers are finally dropping the Windows 11 hate
description: September 2022 Steam survey shows more gamers are updating to Windows 11.

title: Xiaomi 12T series announced with masses of megapixels and 120W charging
description: The Xiaomi 12T Pro has a 200MP camera, 120W charging, a top-end chipset and a mid-range price.

title: The data-sharing system between the US and UK is now active
description: Data Access Agreement will give law enforcement greater powers to combat serious crime, but has attracted criticism.

title: Cloudflare announces quantum cryptography beta to thwart decryption
description: Quantum computers won't be enough to break encryption, Cloudflare believes.

title: VLC developer gets serious over nationwide ban
description: VideoLAN sends legal notice to Indian ministries over VLC ban.

title: iPhones will be forced to use USB-C by 2024, new EU law finally rules
description: USB-C will soon be the single charger standard in the EU, which is likely to mean the end of the Lightning port.

title: Barely anyone is buying foldable smartphones yet
description: Foldable smartphone shipments predicted to increase by two thirds in 2022, and reach 41.5m by 2026.

title: Xbox Game Pass just added a brilliant limb-chopping medieval fighter
description: Chivalry 2 is now on Xbox Game Pass.

title: AMD Ryzen 7000 gives Windows users the perfect reason to move to Linux
description: Ryzen 7000 chips run faster in Linux with security defenses enabled (yes, you read that right).

title: Sorry, AirPods Pro 2's coolest feature isn't coming to the originals after all
description: It looks like the unexpected addition of an Adaptive Transparency option for the original AirPods Pro was a bug.

title: Samsung's smaller micro-LED 4K TV might finally be on the way to battle OLED
description: Micro-LED is the screen tech of the future, but it's slow off the mark – although Samsung might be about to clear the next hurdle.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2 finally runs great on my Steam Deck – but what's next?
description: After a week of having my Steam Deck, I was worried that Rockstar's sequel was too powerful for it – but I was wrong.

title: DJI Store Day is a letdown – wait for Black Friday's drone deals instead
description: DJI Store Day will be here soon, but the sales event's preview shows you'll likely be best off waiting for Black Friday's drone deals.

title: Nothing announces official launch date for new Ear (stick) AirPods alternatives
description: You've got to hand it to Nothing's marketing department, they don't miss a trick…

title: YouTube could make 4K videos exclusive to Premium subscribers
description: Google is reportedly limiting 4K resolution on YouTube to Premium subscribers in certain regions.

title: Focal Bathys might just be the most beautiful headphones I've ever seen
description: I've been waiting a long time for Focal to release these gorgeous wireless cans – and it's been worth the wait.

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Plus could get a battery upgrade – but the S23 Ultra might not
description: A specs leak has revealed a battery boost for the Samsung Galaxy S23 Plus, but no ultra-wide camera upgrades.

title: The Rings of Power didn't utilize Star Wars' Volume technology for one key reason
description: The Rings of Power's VFX producer explains why the fantasy show didn't use Lucasfilm's StageCraft during production.

title: AMD Ryzen 7000 is barely out but next-gen Zen 5 CPUs already spotted
description: Ryzen 8000 sighted already, which is hopefully a good hint that things are very much on track.

title: Fallout 76 is free this week and it's actually good now
description: To mark Fallout's 25th anniversary, Bethesda is making multiplayer FPS Fallout 76 temporarily free to play.

title: Haptic gaming chairs could be the trend of the future, thanks to the Synk X
description: The Synk X is a new haptic gaming chair from Cooler Master, which comes with tons of features such as Bluetooth compatibility.
